1.Name: delete
1.Description: Returns to the top of current call stack.

81.Name: circlePos
81.Description: Performs following operation: $1 = cos($3) * $4 and $2 = cos($3) * $4

91.Name: floatTime
91.Description: In $3 frames using mode $4, variable $2 changes from $5 to $6. $1 is used to set the slot to be used by this ins, every enemy has 8 slots.

300.Name: enmCreate
300.Description: Creates an enemy using subroutine $1 at coordinates ($2, $3) (relative to position of the parent), health of created enemy is $4, score bonus is $5 and item drop is $6.

501.Name: setHitbox
501.Description: Sets caller's hitbox width to $1 and height to $2.

503.Name: flagClear
503.Description: Clears flag(s) according to $1. Refer to the flag table here for exact values.

525.Name: enmKillAll
525.Description: Kills all other enemies (unless they have a flag that prevents that set).

546.Name: bombShield
546.Description: Sets the bomb invulnerability flag ($1=0 false, $1=1 true), the caller's ANM script will change to $2 when a bomb is active.

547.Name: gameSpeed
547.Description: Sets GAME_SPEED to $1 of the normal speed.

601.Name: etOn
601.Description: Shoots bullet(s) using properties from bullet manager $1.

-9989.Name: ANGLE_PLAYER
-9989.Description: Angle from the enemy to the player.

-9985.Name: I0
-9985.Description: Local integer variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9984.Name: I1
-9984.Description: Local integer variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9983.Name: I2
-9983.Description: Local integer variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9982.Name: I3
-9982.Description: Local integer variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9981.Name: F0
-9981.Description: Local float variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9980.Name: F1
-9980.Description: Local float variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9979.Name: F2
-9979.Description: Local float variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9978.Name: F3
-9978.Description: Local float variable, inherited by spawned enemies.

-9963.Name: BOSS_X
-9963.Description: Final X position of the boss.

-9962.Name: BOSS_Y
-9962.Description: Final Y position of the boss.

-9959.Name: DIFF
-9959.Description: Difficulty (E=0, N=1, H=2, L=3, EX=4, O=5).

2.Name: GAME_SPEED
2.Description: The value controls by how much faster the game speed is run. This variable is often set to a number between 0 and 1. This value is often changed when a (final) boss dies or when a photo is taken. Its default value is 1.

270.Name: enmCreate270
270.Description: Creates an enemy using subroutine $1 at coordinates ($2, $3) (relative to position of the stage background camera), health of created enemy is $4, score bonus is $5 and item drop is $6.
